pizzas.title: Non Veg Supreme
pizzas.description: A delightful combination of black olives, onions, grilled mushrooms, pepper BBQ chicken, peri-peri chicken, and grilled chicken rashers, making it a supreme treat for non-vegetarian lovers.

pizzas.title: Golden Corn Pizza
pizzas.description: Enjoy the sweet and savory taste of golden corn with a blend of cheese and other toppings, perfect for those who enjoy a vegetarian delight.

pizzas.title: Jalapeno & Red Paprika Pizza
pizzas.description: Spice up your taste buds with jalapenos and red paprika on a cheesy base, offering a fiery yet flavorful experience.

pizzas.title: Pepper Barbeque Chicken
pizzas.description: Indulge in succulent BBQ chicken topped with a peppery sauce, creating a rich and tangy flavor profile.

pizzas.title: Mexican Green Wave
pizzas.description: Experience a wave of Mexican flavors with a blend of veggies, cheese, and spices that bring a taste of Mexico to every bite.

pizzas.title: Double Cheese Margherita Pizza
pizzas.description: A classic favorite featuring double the cheese on a tomato sauce base, offering a simple yet satisfying pizza experience.

pizzas.title: Pepper Barbeque Chicken
pizzas.description: Indulge in succulent BBQ chicken topped with a peppery sauce, creating a rich and tangy flavor profile.
